channel.title: How to assign a variable a value from another method?
channel.description:
Well the title says it but i will give an example.How do i make variable "A" get set to ItemID in this method? [code]public static void itemOnObject(server.packetHandler.Packets p, client c, int ItemID, int UsedOnObjectID) {[/code]
I know you can do it because i remember when i was reading a book on java, it did something like this.
isn't it like: [code]int A = itemOnObject(ItemID);[/code]

item.title: How to assign a variable a value from another method?
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

that is the correct way to do it, although, i don’t know if the game will accept the variables like that.
